statements: SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date, course_id FROM course_schedule;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT start_date, end_date, course_id, course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date FROM course_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC, course_name ASC
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT course_name, end_date FROM course_schedule WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE start_date < '2022-07-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%' ORDER BY course_id ASC
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, start_date, end_date FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT course_id, week_number, start_date, end_date FROM Timeline WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_weeks FROM CourseSchedule JOIN Timeline ON CourseSchedule.course_id = Timeline.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_weeks FROM CourseSchedule JOIN Timeline ON CourseSchedule.course_id = Timeline.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT course_name, week_number FROM CourseSchedule JOIN Timeline ON CourseSchedule.course_id = Timeline.course_id WHERE course_name LIKE '%Science%' ORDER BY week_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, start_date FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT timeline_name, start_time, end_time FROM course_timeline WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_type, delivery_date FROM delivery_content WHERE delivery_status = true ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, timeline_name, start_time, end_time FROM course_timeline WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY timeline_id DESC;

SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date, timeline_name, start_time, end_time FROM course_schedule s JOIN course_timeline t ON s.course_id = t.course_id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT course_name, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM course_schedule s JOIN delivery_content c ON s.course_id = c.course_id WHERE delivery_status = TRUE ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;

SELECT course_id, course_name, timeline_name, delivery_date FROM course_schedule s LEFT JOIN course_timeline t ON s.course_id = t.course_id LEFT JOIN delivery_content c ON s.course_id = c.course_id WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses;
SELECT instructor_name, expertise_area FROM Instructors;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time, day_of_week FROM ClassSchedule;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses, Instructors WHERE Courses.course_id = Instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT course_name, instructor_name, student_name, start_time, end_time, day_of_week FROM Courses, Instructors, Students, ClassSchedule WHERE Courses.course_id = ClassSchedule.course_id AND Instructors.instructor_id = ClassSchedule.instructor_id AND Students.student_id = ClassSchedule.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Course;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM Student ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, email, phone_number FROM Instructor WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT course_name, start_date FROM Course ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT student_name, email FROM Student WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT instructor_name, phone_number FROM Instructor WHERE email IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM Schedule
